name: Detective Pigeon
description:
CONTROLS 

W: Forward

A: Left

S: Right

D: Backwards

F: Interact

Left Mouse: Progress through dialogue

Left Mouse (HOLD) Drag Objects

OBJECTIVE

Explore the map and solve the mystery. Talk to characters, obtain items and unlock the mystery!

(SPOILERS READ NO FURTHER)

If you are unable to follow the story of the game, or get lost, you can restart or go to the black box on the island and type in the code 420 to unlock the gate and end the game
